elements.name: Submitting empty fields returns correct validation message

steps.name: I have left all input fields empty
I submit the account details form
I can see the account number validation message: "Your account number is required"
I can see the email address validation message: "Your email is required"
I can see the postcode validation message: "Your postcode is required"

elements.name: Submitting invalid input returns correct validation message

steps.name: I have entered "abc" into the account number field
I have entered "test.test" into the email address field
I have entered "123abc" into the postcode field
I submit the account details form
I can see the account number validation message: "Your account number should only contain numbers"
I can see the email address validation message: "Please enter a valid email"
I can see the postcode validation message: "Please enter a valid postcode"

elements.name: Submitting unrecognised account details returns correct validation message

steps.name: I have entered unrecognised account details into the input fields
I submit the account details form
I can see the validation message: "Sorry, we don't recognise your details. Please check them and try again if they are incorrect."

elements.name: The CSAT survey card loads after submitting account details for the first time

steps.name: I enter my account details
I submit the account details form
I can see the CSAT survey card

elements.name: The CSAT survey card loads after submitting account details for the second time

steps.name: I have already used the Winter Support tool and returned to the account details screen
I enter my account details
I submit the account details form
I can see the CSAT survey card

elements.name: Clicking 'What is this scheme about?' reveals EBSS general info

steps.name: I enter my account details
I submit the account details form
I click the EBSS What is this accordion button
I should see the EBSS general info

elements.name: I can click the 'Visit website' button to find out more about EBSS

steps.name: I enter my account details
I submit the account details form
the Visit website button links to the EBSS info page
I am an Orion PAYM DD customer with one past payment and one upcoming payment - redeemed
I submit the account details form

I should see "1-5 days after your Direct Debit payment is collected" under Discount due
I should see "Refund to your bank account" under Discount paid as a

I should see "We show this as a refund taken off your balance." for payment type "bacs" under Where you’ll see your discount
I should see "If you cancel your Direct Debit" for payment type "bacs" under Haven’t received your discount?

elements.name: GenTrack Secure API PAYGSmart account - First 5 months Redeemed

steps.name: I am a GenTrack Secure API PAYGSmart customer with 5 payments received
I submit the account details form
I should see "£67 in March" under Upcoming discount
I should see the payment disclaimer: "*You will receive this discount as long as you do not switch away from OVO or move home without informing us."
I should see "First 5 working days of the month" under Discount due
I should see "Credit to your electricity meter" under Discount paid as a
I should see 5 past payments between October and February
I should not see the Where you’ll see your discount advice

I should see advice on postal strikes
I should see advice on redeeming my voucher

I should not see the Haven’t received your discount advice

I submit the account details form
the Learn More button links to the WHD info page
I am a PAYG customer and have received my WHD electricity meter credit
I submit the account details form
I should see the WHD anchor button
I should see Discount paid as a: "Credit to your electricity meter"
I should see Payment issue date: "Paid on 01/09/2022"
I should not see a Due by date or advice on moving home or postal strikes
